definition: large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout

sentences.english: Fireworks welcomed the new year in moscow's red square.
sentences.chinese: 人們在莫斯科紅場燃放煙花慶祝新年。

sentences.english: I checked into the National Hotel, just off Red Square.
sentences.chinese: 我住進了“紅場”邊上的民族飯店。

sentences.english: Red Square has always been a central gathering place, even in the days of the Czars.
sentences.chinese: 即使是在沙皇政權時期，紅場也向來都是中心聚集地。

sentences.english: Smoke from wildfires in Red Square last week (Image: Natalia Kolesnikova/AFP/Getty)
sentences.chinese: 上個星期，野火散發出的煙霧瀰漫紅場。

sentences.english: Once again military parades are being held in Red Square.
sentences.chinese: 紅場再次舉行閱兵儀式。

sentences.english: In the red mausoleum, Lenin people visit every day the dead looks.
sentences.chinese: 在紅場裏的列寧陵墓，每天都有民衆瞻仰其遺容。

definition: Great stone bridge or Dashiqiao county level city in Yingkou 營口|营口, Liaoning
to go sightseeing/to spend one's leisure time wandering around
honor guard/guard of honor/the banner bearing contingent leading a military procession

pinyin: Xi3 ma3 la1 ya3 shan1 mai4

definition: Renai or Jenai township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
